name: hilcompl
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, ccauold), wrex(s0, chba, wbr(c0, chli, cv(s0))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, c2)), wrex(s0, chba, wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c3), cv(s0))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccauold), wrex(s0, chba, wbr(c0, chli, cv(s0))))
-| wceq(c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cims, c1))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, c2)), wrex(s0, chba, wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c3), cv(s0))))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccauold), wrex(s0, chba, wbr(c0, chli, cv(s0))))
-| wceq(c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cims, c1))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, c2)), wrex(s0, chba, wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c3), cv(s0))))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

body.origin:
|- wceq(c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
-| wceq(chba, cfv(cba, c1))
-| wceq(cva, cfv(cpv, c1))
-| wceq(csm, cfv(cns, c1))
-| wceq(csp, cfv(cdip, c1))
-| wcel(c1, cnv)
body.pretty:
⊢ c1 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
⊣ ~H =(BaseSet ` c1)
⊣ +h =(+v ` c1)
⊣ .h =(.sOLD ` c1)
⊣ .ih =(.iOLD ` c1)
⊣ c1 ∈ NrmCVec

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccauold), wrex(s0, chba, wbr(c0, chli, cv(s0))))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cims, c1))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, c2)), wrex(s0, chba, wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c3), cv(s0))))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| wceq(chba, cfv(cba, c1))
-| wceq(cva, cfv(cpv, c1))
-| wceq(csm, cfv(cns, c1))
-| wceq(csp, cfv(cdip, c1))
-| wcel(c1, cnv)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Cauchy → ∃(s0 ∈ ~H, c0[~~>v]s0))
⊣ c2 =(IndMet ` c1)
⊣ c3 =(MetOpen ` c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈(Cau ` c2)→ ∃(s0 ∈ ~H, c0[(~~>t ` c3)]s0))
⊣ d(s0, c0)
⊣ ~H =(BaseSet ` c1)
⊣ +h =(+v ` c1)
⊣ .h =(.sOLD ` c1)
⊣ .ih =(.iOLD ` c1)
⊣ c1 ∈ NrmCVec

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccauold), wrex(s0, chba, wbr(c0, chli, cv(s0))))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cims, c1))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, c2)), wrex(s0, chba, wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c3), cv(s0))))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| wceq(chba, cfv(cba, c1))
-| wceq(cva, cfv(cpv, c1))
-| wceq(csm, cfv(cns, c1))
-| wceq(csp, cfv(cdip, c1))
-| wcel(c1, chlo)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Cauchy → ∃(s0 ∈ ~H, c0[~~>v]s0))
⊣ c2 =(IndMet ` c1)
⊣ c3 =(MetOpen ` c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈(Cau ` c2)→ ∃(s0 ∈ ~H, c0[(~~>t ` c3)]s0))
⊣ d(s0, c0)
⊣ ~H =(BaseSet ` c1)
⊣ +h =(+v ` c1)
⊣ .h =(.sOLD ` c1)
⊣ .ih =(.iOLD ` c1)
⊣ c1 ∈ CHilOLD

comment: Lemma used for derivation of the completeness axiom ~ ax-hcompl from ZFC Hilbert space theory. The first five hypotheses would be satisfied by the definitions described in ~ ax-hilex ; the 6th would be satisfied by ~ eqid ; the 7th by a given fixed Hilbert space; and the last by theorem ~ hlcompl . (Contributed by NM, 13-Sep-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
